name: Ultimate Sandbox Remastered + Nepal Nation
description: Enhanced sandbox mod featuring the complete Nepal civilization! Play as Nepal with 12 unique buildings, 12 military units, and authentic cultural representation. Includes original sandbox elements plus the authentic 'Never Conquered' Nepal nation with Gurkha warriors, Himalayan buildings, and historical accuracy.
author: Aayush Acharya

uniques: Nepal Civilization: Complete military roster from ancient to modern era
Authentic Buildings: Representing all three geographic regions of Nepal
Cultural Accuracy: Hindu-majority secular nation theme
Historical Theme: Never Conquered civilization bonuses
